JUDGES: András Sajó;Françoise Tulkens;Guido Raimondi;Ireneu Cabral Barreto;Kristina Pardalos;Nona Tsotsoria
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought an action against several respondents before the GPE XX / XXI / XXIII ORG , requesting it to establish the invalidity of a contract and to order the respondents to vacate the house in which they lived .
CARDINAL . Subsequently , several hearings took place and the opinion of an expert was obtained . DATE and DATE the case was suspended pending a related procedure before the land registry .

CARDINAL . After several further hearings , on DATE ORG dismissed the action . On appeal , ORG upheld the essence of the first - instance decision on DATE . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s petition for review .
